calendar.description: House Law Enforcement and Criminal Justice Hearing
Senate Health and Human Services Hearing

general_provisions: This bill modifies the Utah Occupational Disease Act by expanding the rebuttable presumption for a firefighter diagnosed with cancer.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>expands the list of cancers that presumptively arise from service as a firefighter;<hr><ltbullet>establishes requirements for the rebuttable presumption;<hr><ltbullet> excludes respiratory cancers related to the use of cigarettes, electronic cigarettes, tobacco products, or marijuana from the rebuttable presumption;<hr><ltbullet>provides a cancer screening to the firefighter;<hr><ltbullet>requires the fire department where a firefighter is working to cover the out-of-pocket cost of the cancer screening; and <hr><ltbullet>provides for the management of the cancer screening program.
